About Us

Building Excellence Since 2012

Quality construction delivered with precision, integrity, and unwavering commitment to our clients.

Our Story

Valour Construction was founded in 2012 by Simbarashe Dongo and Martin K. Mhundwa with a vision to deliver world-class construction services in Zimbabwe.

What started as a small team has grown into a respected construction company with over 100 completed projects across the country. Our commitment to quality, attention to detail, and client satisfaction has earned us a reputation as one of Zimbabwe's most trusted builders.

We believe in building not just structures, but lasting relationships with our clients. Every project we undertake is a testament to our dedication to excellence and our passion for construction.

Our Journey

2012

Company Founded

Valour Construction established in Harare, Zimbabwe with a vision for excellence.

2015

First Major Project

Completed our first large-scale commercial construction project.

2018

Expansion

Expanded services to include residential construction and renovations.

2024

100+ Projects

Proudly celebrating over 100 successful projects across Zimbabwe.

Our Core Values

Quality

We never compromise on quality. Every project meets the highest standards of craftsmanship and materials.

Integrity

Honesty and transparency guide every interaction. We deliver what we promise, on time and on budget.

Reliability

Count on us to deliver. Our track record speaks to our commitment to meeting deadlines and exceeding expectations.

Our Leadership

Simbarashe Dongo

Co-Founder & Director

With extensive experience in construction management, Simbarashe leads our commercial projects division.

Martin K. Mhundwa

Co-Founder & Director

Martin oversees residential projects and client relations, ensuring every homeowner's vision becomes reality.
